original_title: Hip Hop for Kids: Pop, Lock and Break
overview: You will learn the latest in hip-hop: dance: popping, locking, and breaking. It takes a lot of practice to master a dance form so be ready for a challenge! Keep practicing and you will catch all the moves. Special Performance-by Roger G, GG, Poker and Ms. Twist
title: Hip Hop for Kids: Pop, Lock and Break
